author: jwasinger
content: Here's an update on cost savings for MiMC using EVM384-v7, and also some notes about limitations of the evm384-v7 spec: https://hackmd.io/bHRfQfWaRmuIbNLTEQ6fyg

author: pauld.9606
content: <@!427903869226582018> thank you for your hard work. I am sure it took a long time to implement MiMC in evm384. I know that it is very tedious work.
